Acceptance_Criteria: Fatigue life requirement defined (min cycles at design pressure + cryo temp); acceptance threshold traceable to CS-25.571 and AMC 25.571
Description: Define minimum fatigue life requirement for CCC wall and weld zones under combined cryo-thermal and pressure cycling

Acceptance_Criteria: FEA fatigue model validated; S-N curve inputs documented; stress ratio R and temperature-dependent material properties sourced; crack initiation life predicted for base metal and weld HAZ
Description: Finite element fatigue analysis — thermal transient stress + pressure cycling superposition on CCC geometry (Al-Li 2195 or equivalent)

Acceptance_Criteria: Fracture mechanics assessment complete; da/dN at cryo temperatures characterised; critical crack length defined; inspection interval derived
Description: Damage tolerance analysis — crack growth under cryo-cycling for circular cell wall and longitudinal/circumferential welds

Acceptance_Criteria: FHA updated with cryo-fatigue failure mode; FMEA includes crack initiation and propagation scenarios; hazard severity and probability rated
Description: Safety assessment update — integrate cryo-cycling fatigue failure modes into ATA 28-10 FHA and system-level FMEA

Acceptance_Criteria: Coupon test plan approved; specimen matrix covers base metal + weld + HAZ; test temperatures include 20 K and 77 K; min 3 specimens per condition
Description: Cryo-fatigue coupon test plan — define specimen geometry and test matrix for S-N characterisation at cryogenic temperatures

Acceptance_Criteria: Test results documented; S-N data points plotted with statistical treatment (B-basis minimum); correlation to FEA predictions assessed; scatter factor justified
Description: Execute cryo-fatigue coupon tests and report — generate S-N data at 20 K and 77 K for CCC candidate alloy and weld configuration

Acceptance_Criteria: Baseline updated with selected alloy and weld process; effectivity recorded; delta from TS-28-10-TS01 baseline captured
Description: Configuration baseline update — lock material selection and weld specification into design baseline following test correlation

Acceptance_Criteria: Descriptive DM authored; BREX validation passed; traces to REQ-002 and TEST-002 resolved; ICN cross-references for S-N curves included
Description: S1000D descriptive data module — CCC fatigue substantiation summary for ATA 28-10-00
